attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think tv licences should be scrapped 
as it is an essential household item 
and with most programs not worth watching its a waste of money to people and profit to others therefor 
we do not need a licence to listen to the radio and we do pay enough to subscribe to sky,virgin media and freeview channels therefor channels 1 - 5 should be free to all . otherwise goverment should consider giving us programs worth our money. as there is not alot of people who like daytime tv shows ie homes under the hammer and and different diy shows .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
